fall_asleep.title: The Magical Transport
fall_asleep.text:
As sleep takes you, the stone's glow intensifies. Blue light fills your 
vision, and you feel yourself falling... floating...

The world dissolves in streams of azure light.

You wake to waves crashing against sand. Salt air fills your lungs. You're 
on a beach with the stone still in your hand.

But this isn't any normal beach. Three moons hang in the purple sky, and a 
magnificent castle rises from distant cliffs.

choices.text: Check if the stone is still glowing
Call out to see if anyone's around

beach_awakening.title: The Strange Shore
beach_awakening.text:
You stand on white sand that sparkles like diamonds. The water is crystal 
clear, with glowing coral formations in the shallows.

Behind you, a dense forest rises toward cloud-piercing mountains. Across the 
water, an imposing castle silhouette dominates the horizon.

Suddenly, you hear approaching hoofbeats.

check_stone.title: The Stone's Power
check_stone.text:
The stone pulses with renewed energy. As you focus on it, you feel strange 
power coursing through you.

You sense you're in a magical realm far from home, but everything else remains 
a mystery.

The sound of approaching hoofbeats interrupts your revelation.

call_out.title: Calling for Help
call_out.text:
"Hello?" you call across the beach. Your voice echoes, followed only by 
the sound of waves.

Then you hear thundering hoofbeats. Three riders in gleaming armor crest a 
distant dune, galloping toward you.

Your call has been answered - but are they friends or foes?
